name: Shadow (itch) (Blur)
description:
This is a 2D Top-Down (non)Shooter where the player has been split into two. Control your SOUL using WASD or Movement Keys. Your SHADOW is attached to you, it will grow stronger over time, which improves it's ability to destroy enemies and yourself.

This is a submission for the Mini Jam 111 game jam! The theme this year was "You are your own enemy"

-- Controls --

WASD or Arrow Keys
